mapper.select: select business as name, count(*) as value from t_job group by business
select area as name, count(*) as value from t_job group by area

select count(*) from t_job j left join t_hr h on j.create_hr_id=h.id left join t_company c on j.company_id=c.id
and j.education like concat('%',#{job},'%')
and j.education like concat('%',#{education},'%')
and j.area like concat('%',#{area},'%')
and j.area like concat('%',#{business},'%')
and j.create_time >= #{startDate}
and j.create_time <= #{endDate}
